dc_description_s: ROADS_2005_INDOT_IN is a line shapefile of Indiana roads. The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by INDOT for the source shapefile GIS_RDS.SHP: GIS_RDS is a polyline SDE feature class that shows Indiana roads, consisting of City Streets, County Roads and US, State and Interstate Roads, and non-certified other roads.
dc_creator_sm: Indiana Department of Transportation, Business Information and Technology Systems, GIS Mapping (creator and processor)
United States Department of Commerce, United States Census Bureau (creator)
dc_publisher_sm: Indiana Department of Transportation, Business Information and Technology Systems, GIS Mapping
dc_title_s: Indiana Roads from INDOT and TIGER Files: Indiana, 2005
